utterance: <speak>Within the area of, forces and motion, please select a topic by clicking on a picture below.</speak>
<speak>Below are some variables that might affect the speed of balls at the bottom of ramps. you can test one of these variables in your experiment</speak>
<speak>The slope of the ramp, the color of the ball, the starting position of the ball, and the surface texture of the ramp</speak>
<speak>Here are all of the materials that may be necessary for this experiment, a speedometer, a ramp, and a ball.</speak>
<speak>We will place a ball on the ramp.</speak>
<speak>The ball will roll down the ramp.</speak>
<speak>We will measure the balls speed at the bottom of the ramp.</speak>
<speak>Push the button in the middle of the screen to see how this experiment works</speak>

<speak>In this experiment, there are only four things we can change, any of these might make a difference in the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp, these are the four variables you can test in this experiment, the slope of the ramp, which can be steep</speak>
<speak>Or not steep might make a difference</speak>
<speak>The color of the ball which can be yellow</speak>
<speak>The starting position of the ball which can be in the middle</speak>
<speak>Or at the top might make a difference</speak>
<speak>And the surface texture of the ramp, which can be rough</speak>
<speak>Or smooth, this might also make a difference</speak>
<speak>Select the variable you would like to test</speak>
<speak>This variable is the independent variable of your experiment</speak>
<speak>The research question you have chosen is, Does the slope of the ramp affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>OK!, you have chosen as your Research Question, Does the slope of the ramp affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>The research question you have chosen is, Does the color of the ball affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>OK!, you have chosen as your Research Question, Does the color of the ball affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>The research question you have chosen is, Does the starting position of the ball affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>OK!, you have chosen as your Research Question, Does the starting position of the ball affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>The research question you have chosen is, Does the surface texture of the ramp affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
<speak>OK!, you have chosen as your Research Question, Does the surface texture of the ramp affect the speed of the ball at the bottom of the ramp?</speak>
